sentences.en: Applicant: Please complete this section before submitting to evaluator.
sentences.cn: 申请人: 请在交给推荐人之前填写完此部分.

sentences.en: Encourage everyone to be a critical evaluator.
sentences.cn: 鼓励每一位团体成员都要做评论家.

sentences.en: How the patent evaluator thinks: The inventor and evaluator protocol is described.
sentences.cn: 专利评估者如何思考: 介绍发明人和评估人协议.

sentences.en: The expression evaluator uses the normal dominance rules.
sentences.cn: 表达式计算器使用正常域控制规则.

sentences.en: The test shows that the cocoon evaluator can meet the demand of fast and accurate evaluation.
sentences.cn: 试验表明,评茧仪能够满足快速、准确评茧分级的要求.

sentences.en: We will create a poker-hand evaluator, a slot-machine generator, and a casino bank, allowing you to practice some trickier PHP logic.
sentences.cn: 我们将创建一个扑克牌求值程序、老虎机生成器及博彩银行，允许您实践一些更棘手的 PHP 逻辑。

words.tran_cn: 评价；[审计] 评估；估价；求值
评估员；[电子]鉴别器；求值程序
